reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, with one noting it looks very expensive. The fabric receives positive feedback, with one customer describing it as nice spring yellow tweed, and customers appreciate its heavy weight and lined construction. The dress is true to color and matches the quality of a designer dress. While some customers find it runs very large, opinions about the fit are mixed. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit! Great fabric!
items.body: Let me start by saying that this dress is beautiful! I did go with another reviewerâ€™s suggestion that it ran big. It didnâ€™t for me. I should have ordered my normal size. That said, I do intend to wear this as a nice dress coat, so not buttoning it is not a problem because I will wear it opened. The fabric is great! Itâ€™s fully lined. It has pockets!!!! The buttons are covered. This is a heavy, quality, fabric! This will serve well buttoned as a dress as shown or worn as a costume. Well worth the cost!! Donâ€™t hesitate to buy this! Read more
items.author: VickiSu

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful coat Dress
items.body: Beautiful coat Dress well made, expensive Looking material. Best for spring and fall occasions, as the it Is lined, so a little heavy. Read more
items.author: Merlene allen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tweed pretty
items.body: The dress is pretty, it stands up to the quality. The fabric was tweed just like I wanted, and the weight was just right. It didn't have a smell at all. The comfort was nice. Just a little big on me. It felt like it would ve warm in the weather. I am 5 feet pear shape and weights 145 lbs. I usually orders a large; with this dress I should have ordered a medium. I want to wear it as a dress not a coat. On me fits big in a large size so I will be returning it for a size medium. Read more
items.author: Placeholder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: I love, love, love this dress! It runs VERY large--after two returns, I finally have the right size and it is so much lovelier than I had anticipated. Very heavy tweed, beautifully lined, will be perfect for everything from the office to holiday parties with the right accessories. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect outfit
items.body: Iâ€™m 5â€™6â€ and 162 lbs, and I bought this dress in a medium. It fits perfectly! I was considering a small based on some of the reviews, but since I have a pear shaped body, I decided to go with the medium and Iâ€™m glad I did. The fit is just right. The dress is very well made and even has a liner, which I really appreciate. The yellow color is a beautiful, soft shade of yellow. It also arrived on time. Donâ€™t hesitate to buy it Iâ€™m very happy with this purchase! Read more
items.author: Saad bahri

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars More like a coatâ€¦but beautiful!
items.body: This is very pretty but looks more like a coat than a coat dress. The cream color, the weight, and the texture is beautiful. It was just a little too boxy on me so I returned it. My advice is to buy this and it might look better on you than on me! Read more
items.author: linda mutch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Excellent Buy
items.body: This dress is beautiful. The workmanship is excellent and matches the quality of a designer dress that cost so much more. It is lined and I can imagine wearing it as both as a dress or a coat since I got the beige/cream color. The fabric and lining make it heavy so I will have to wait for fall /winter to wear it. The XL fit well on me and, being 5â€™9, the length was perfect. Donâ€™t sleep on this one - itâ€™s an excellent buy and it came perfectly packaged!!! Read more
items.author: SYLVIA J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy thus sheik
items.body: The coat is heavy and is wide enough to go around my big hips and â€œtrunkâ€ which is a common problem for me. I was worried I would need to go up to the next size bc of that but they designed the jacket just right! Read more
items.author: Brandi Roman

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
